successes.title: Wild West Exodus - Sci-Fi Western Miniatures Game
successes.description: WWX is a 35mm miniatures game in a dark wild west setting. Strange technologies rule the old west and death lurks at every corner.

Pledges.description: Guilty - Official Thank You in the Rulebook and on the Website, Beta Game Rules in PDF Version

Rotten - Official Thank You in the Rulebook and on the Website, Beta Game Rules in PDF Version, Wild West Exodus Comic Issue #1 - Kickstarter Exclusive Cover, Signed Art Print, Kickstarter Exclusive Dark Council Patch, Wild West Exodus Set of Four Dice and Wild West Exodus Season 1 Comic Book Subscription (6 Issues).
Evil - Wild West Exodus Core Rulebook (Hardback)

Nasty - Pick any add-on item from the list and make up your own mini posse.  Call this money in the bank until you're ready to select your unlocked items.  A survey will be sent at the end of the campaign to help you choose the items you want.

Villainous - Starter Box from the Faction of your choice (includes 5x Long Range Hired Hands, 5x Close Combat Hired Hands and 1x Boss), Wild West Exodus Beta Game Rules in PDF Version and Wild West Exodus Comic Issue #1 - Kickstarter Exclusive Cover

Wicked - Early Bird Special - 2x Starter Boxes from the Faction of your choice (each box includes 5x Long Range Hired Hands, 5x Close Combat Hired Hands and 1x Boss), Wild West Exodus Core Rulebook (Hardback), 2x Kickstarter Exclusive Sculpt of Dark Council models and all unlocked stretch goals as listed in the Wicked Pledge Level.

Wicked - 2x Starter Boxes from the Faction of your choice (each box includes 5x Long Range Hired Hands, 5x Close Combat Hired Hands and 1x Boss), Wild West Exodus Core Rulebook (Hardback), 2x Kickstarter Exclusive Sculpt of Dark Council models and all unlocked stretch goals as listed in the Wicked Pledge Level.

Heinous - 1 x Factions Starter Box of your choice that includes 1 x Boss, 1 x Underboss, 1 x Sidekick, 1 x Heavy Weapon Hired Hand, 10 x Hired Hand Box (includes 5x Long Range and 5x Close Combat models), 1 x Lady of the West Model, 1 x Dark Council or Spirit Totem Influence Model, 1 x Boss Wave 2, 1 x Underboss Wave 2, 1 x Sidekick Wave 2, 3 x Light Support Choice, 5 WWX Dice, and PDF Beta Rules.

Fiendish - Early Bird Special - 4x Starter Boxes from the Faction of your choice (each box includes 5x Long Range Hired Hands, 5x Close Combat Hired Hands and 1x Boss), 2x Wild West Exodus Core Rulebooks (Hardback), 4x Kickstarter Exclusive Sculpt of Dark Council models and all unlocked stretch goals as listed in the Fiendish Pledge Level.

Fiendish - 4x Starter Boxes from the Faction of your choice (each box includes 5x Long Range Hired Hands, 5x Close Combat Hired Hands and 1x Boss), 2x Wild West Exodus Core Rulebooks (Hardback), 4x Kickstarter Exclusive Sculpt of Dark Council models and all unlocked stretch goals as listed in the Fiendish Pledge Level.

Cruel - Single Faction Pack - Includes 1 x Starter Box of your choice, 1 x Alt Sculpt Boss Model, 1 x Lady Of The West Model, 1 x Wave 2 Heavy Weapon HH, 2 x Dark Council and Spirit Totem Models, 4 x Merc Crew, 1 x Wave 2 Boss Model, 1 x Wave 2 Underboss Model, 1 x Wave 2 Sidekick Model, 3 x Light Support Choice, 1 x Heavy Support Choice, 1 x Hired Hand Box, 1 x Rule Book, 1 x Template Set, 1 x Dice Set, 1 x Battle Foam Bandit Bag, and any additional unlocked items as shown in the graphic on the main page.

Shameless - 4x Starter Boxes from the Faction of your choice (each box includes 5x Long Range Hired Hands, 5x Close Combat Hired Hands and 1x Boss), 2x Wild West Exodus Core Rulebook (Hardback), 4x Kickstarter Exclusive Sculpt of Dark Council models, 2x Hired Hands Box from Faction of your choice (includes 5x Long Range and 5x Close Combat models),1x Template Set and all unlocked stretch goals as listed in the Shameless Pledge Level.

Repulsive - Early Bird Special - Includes all the contents of Shameless + 8 x Heavy Weapon Models Wave 1 and Wave 2, 1 x Heavy Support Vehicle of your choice, 1 x WWX Concept Art Book, + 2x Hired Hands Box from Faction of your choice (includes 5x Long Range and 5x Close Combat models),and all unlocked stretch goals as listed in Repulsive

Repulsive - Includes all the contents of Shameless + 8 x Heavy Weapon Models Wave 1 and Wave 2, 1 x Heavy Support Vehicle of your choice, 1 x WWX Concept Art Book, + 2x Hired Hands Box from Faction of your choice (includes 5x Long Range and 5x Close Combat models),and all unlocked stretch goals as listed in Repulsive
Profane - One Time Wild West Exodus Comic Book Character Appearance of You (1 Issue) and everything from the Fiendish Pledge Level.

Corrupt - Early Bird Special - Includes all the contents of Repulsive + 12 x Additional Light Support Vehicles, 4 x Heavy Support Vehicle of your choice, 2 x Additional Dark Council or Sprit Totem Models, 1 x Additional Terrain Barricades, 1 x Battle Foam Outlaw Bag, 1 x Battle Foam Bandit Bag, 1 x Wave 2 Underboss Models, 1 x Wave 2 Boss Models, 1 x Each Micro Art Studio Terrain buildins, 3 x Additional Sets of Dice, 1 x WWX Concept Art Book, + 6x Hired Hands Box from Faction of your choice (includes 5x Long Range and 5x Close Combat models),and all unlocked stretch goals as listed in Repulsive

Corrupt - Includes all the contents of Repulsive + 12 x Additional Light Support Vehicles (for a total of 15), 4 x Heavy Support Vehicle of your choice (for a total of 4), 2 x Additional Dark Council or Sprit Totem Models, 1 x Additional Terrain Barricades, 1 x Battle Foam Outlaw Bag, 1 x Battle Foam Bandit Bag, 1 x Wave 2 Underboss Models, 1 x Wave 2 Boss Models, 1 x Each Micro Art Studio Terrain buildins, 3 x Additional Sets of Dice, 1 x WWX Concept Art Book, + 6x Hired Hands Box from Faction of your choice (for a total of 10 boxes) (includes 5x Long Range and 5x Close Combat models),and all unlocked stretch goals as listed in Repulsive. Please always refer to the graphic for each pledge level on the main page.  The graphic is always updated with the latest pledge unlocks and bonus items.
Depraved - One Full Season Comic Book Character Appearance of You (6 issues as hero) and everything from the Shameless Pledge Level.
Wayward - One full faction of your choice painted by Tom Schadle (13 models) and everything from the Repulsive Pledge Level.  First Pledge will be delivered by January 2014.
Incorrigible - Hero in the Game as a Model, Full Season in Comic (6 Issues as Hero) and everything from the Corrupt Pledge Level.

Devilish - Ultimate WWX Pack - Hero in the Game as a Model, Full Season in Comic, and everything from the Repulsive Pledge Level. Also includes studio visit in Phoenix, Arizona to discuss and design your model.  Hotel and dinner with the creators is included.  A maximum flight credit of $500 will be issued. Any additional travel expenses are the responsibility of the backer.
